name: Enhanced Darkmode | Webnovel
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
That's just an enhanced dark theme. Yes, I know, Webnovel's dark mode is just awful. By default of the Webnovel, only the reading page has the dark theme, one day I will do it for the other pages. How do I activate the theme? - It is necessary to do it manually in the reading page, in the right menu, click on Display Options, and then choose the third option for background.
additional_info: v0.1.3 - Fix color in chapter title operation bar
